name: DROPKICK
description:
Play with a friend and aim for the highest score! 
Dropkick to shake the world, topple enemies and annoy your friend!

Features:

  • 2 Gamemodes: Time and Score mode!
  • 5 Stages to fight in!
  • 2 player fun! (at least one controller necessary)
  • JoyCon support!

Controls:


X to Jump
C to Dropkick when mid-air
Arrow keys to move

4th submission to Game-A-Month
Follow me on Twitter for updates on next month's game!
